title: Conversation
provenance_text:
The artist, Thomas Hart Benton [1889-1975], Kansas City, MO, until October 1936 [1]; Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), October 1936 until April 1, 1973 [2]; bequest to  Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited in the 1936 International Exhibition of Paintings, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October-December 1936 (no. 58, illustrated, plate 110.) 
[2]. Mr. Rosenbloom purchased the painting from the International for $1,000. See "American Paintings and Sculpture to 1945 in the Carnegie Museum of Art," pages 66-67 and also copies of relevant digitized documents from Archives of American Art in curatorial file.

creator.death_place: Kansas City (Jackson county, Missouri, United States)
